title: William Lane Craig & Quentin Smith - Einstein, Relativity an
description:
William Lane Craig & Quentin Smith - Einstein, Relativity and Absolute Simultaneity

Einstein, Relativity and Absolute Simultaneity is an anthology of original essays by an international team of leading philosophers and physicists who have come together to reassess the contemporary paradigm of the relativistic concept of time. A great deal has changed since 1905 when Einstein proposed his Special Theory of Relativity, and this book offers a fresh reassessment of Special RelativityÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s relativistic concept of time in terms of epistemology, metaphysics, and physics.
